data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 1,302,000 souls living in the county of Jiangmen with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jiangmen, Guangdong, China
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the county of Jiangmen.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Jiangmen, Guangdong, China to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Jiangmen access to a Bible in their own language.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Zhuang, Liuqian people.
Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Jiangmen.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Jiangmen
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Jiangmen do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

location.name: Jiangmen
location.people_groups_list: Iu Mien, Lakkia, Malay, Ban Yao, Zhuang, Liujiang
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Iu Mien (1,303,000), Lakkia (14,000), Malay (15,000), Ban Yao (37,000), Zhuang, Liujiang (1,730,000)
